subject: Fish and Other Marine Life
Weather
lead_paragraph: Located between the down-at-the-heels mill towns of New Bedford and Fall River, the Westport’s blue-ribbon, blue-collar fishery remains comparatively crowd-free.
snippet: Located between the down-at-the-heels mill towns of New Bedford and Fall River, the Westport’s blue-ribbon, blue-collar fishery remains comparatively crowd-free.
